home.subtitle: I'm glad you're here exploring my work. This portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and experience as a full-stack JavaScript/TypeScript developer with 5+ years of building production-ready systems.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullstack.text: Node.js backends, distributed workers, real-time features, EDI integrations, and complex UI with React/React Native. End-to-end delivery from concept to production.

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.text: Strong expertise in designing scalable architectures, microservices, API development, and database optimization for high-performance applications.

performance.title: AI & Automation

about.title: About This Portfolio
about.text: This portfolio contains my projects and will continue to expand with new work, case studies, and insights into my development journey.

orderTransfers.title: Sell-Out & Order Transfers
orderTransfers.short: ERP-like cart transfer flow with approvals, partial acceptance, and EDI checks.

docAiParser.title: Document Intelligence Parser
docAiParser.short: Unified JSON parser for Azure Document Intelligence and Google Document AI.

echoLingo.title: EchoLingo
echoLingo.short: Real-time translator app with public and private modes and streaming avatars.

falconHeavy.title: Falcon Heavy Platform
falconHeavy.subtitle: Subscription-based group management and administrative tools
falconHeavy.short: A full-stack platform for subscription handling, payments, and location-based group management.
highlights: Scalable backend built with Fastify and Bull workers for background processing
Integrated Google Maps for dynamic group and administrative visualization
Role-based access, subscription management, and secure payment flow
description: Falcon Heavy is a full-stack web platform designed to manage subscription-based groups and administrative workflows. It combines a modular Fastify API with React-powered interfaces and integrates background jobs using Bull and Redis.
The system supports payment processing, privilege-based group creation, subscription management, and administrative dashboards optimized for large datasets.
The platform also integrates Google Maps to provide location-aware group visualization and real-time administrative insights.

creditcloser.title: Creditcloser Loan Management System
creditcloser.subtitle: Web application for loan creation, debtor notifications, and full administrative control.
creditcloser.short: A full loan management platform with automated notifications, reporting, and a powerful admin panel.
highlights: Automated debtor notifications using dynamic templates and scheduling
Full administrative panel for managing loans, users, and communication settings
Secure authentication using Passport and Redis-backed sessions
description: The Creditcloser application is a full-featured loan management system designed to streamline financial operations for administrators. It provides tools to create loans, manage users, and automate borrower notifications.
The frontend includes a React-powered admin dashboard built with Material UI and React Admin, enabling efficient handling of loan data, users, payments, and monthly profit reports.

The backend integrates Express, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, and Redis to implement secure authentication, automated email workflows using SendGrid and Handlebars, and scheduled reporting tasks via node-cron.
The system also includes infrastructure-level tooling such as Docker, Nginx, and AWS services to ensure reliable deployment and smooth performance.

ndaB2BCommerce.title: NDA B2B Commerce Platform
ndaB2BCommerce.subtitle: Full-stack multi-role B2B commerce system with advanced inventory, ordering, and administrative capabilities.
ndaB2BCommerce.short: A large-scale NDA B2B commerce platform with complex business roles, multi-country structure, and full administrative control.
description: This NDA-protected project is a large B2B commerce platform operating across multiple regions and user roles. The system manages complex purchasing workflows, administrative controls, inventory interactions, and large data sets. The solution includes a powerful internal dashboard used by various business units.

The project includes long-term maintenance and iterative development of new features. Work involves architectural updates, performance improvements, debugging complex business logic, and implementing new internal tools requested by the client.

modularWebPlatforms.title: Modular Web Platforms
modularWebPlatforms.subtitle: Scalable multi-module web platform with education, recruitment, and administration features.
modularWebPlatforms.short: A modular web platform combining learning management, job vacancies, and an administrative dashboard.
highlights: Modular architecture supporting multiple independent sub-projects
Hierarchical learning system with task customization and progress tracking
Job vacancy management with search, filtering, and applicant workflows
Centralized admin panel for content, users, and operational oversight
Production deployment using AWS infrastructure
description: Modular Web Platforms is a scalable web solution composed of several interconnected sub-systems, designed to support different business and educational use cases within a single architecture.
The educational module implements a hierarchical learning structure with configurable tasks, progress tracking, and user-friendly interfaces focused on clarity and usability.
The recruitment module provides functionality for creating and managing job vacancies, including applicant-facing search and filtering as well as internal tracking of applications.
An administrative dashboard enables centralized management of vacancies, user interactions, and platform operations, ensuring consistency and operational control across all modules.
The platform was built with a modern React and TypeScript stack and deployed using AWS services, with a strong focus on maintainability, scalability, and code quality.

ndaHealthCoach.title: NDA Full-Stack Platform
ndaHealthCoach.subtitle: A large-scale full-stack application with AI features, multi-role access, and complex data processing.
ndaHealthCoach.short: A multi-module platform combining real-time features, data ingestion pipelines, and interactive visualization components.
highlights: AI-powered user interaction components
Automated processing workflows for large unstructured datasets
Integration with several external APIs for continuous data synchronization
Advanced visualization modules including 3D and timeline-based interfaces
Role-based system with a configurable administrative panel
description: This NDA-protected project is a full-stack platform consisting of multiple integrated modules, real-time communication features, and automated data workflows. The system handles high-volume data ingestion from various external services and processes it through background tasks and structured pipelines.

dataReportingWebApp.title: Web Application for Data Reporting
dataReportingWebApp.subtitle: Client-focused web tool for data search and automated Excel report generation.
dataReportingWebApp.short: A specialized web application for large-scale data search and automated Excel-based reporting.
highlights: Parallel request handling with real-time status tracking
Global keyword-based search across large datasets
Automated Excel report generation using Google Sheets
Client-oriented UI focused on efficiency and clarity
description: This project involved the development of a custom web application designed to streamline data discovery and reporting workflows for a client.
The application supports extensive keyword-based searches across large datasets, enabling users to efficiently locate and analyze relevant information.
Frontend logic was implemented to manage multiple parallel requests, providing real-time visibility into request progress and improving overall user interaction.
Report generation was automated using Google Apps Script and the Google Sheets API, producing structured Excel reports based on keyword analysis.
The solution was built with standard web technologies, ensuring a responsive interface tailored to the client’s operational needs.

boomfShopifyWebApp.title: Boomf Shopify Web Application
boomfShopifyWebApp.subtitle: Interactive Shopify-integrated web application for customizable postcard products.
boomfShopifyWebApp.short: A Shopify-integrated web application enabling customers to design and purchase personalized postcards.
highlights: Highly interactive postcard customizer integrated directly into Shopify
Complex frontend state management using Redux and Redux-Saga
Scalable and maintainable styling with Styled Components
Seamless integration with Shopify API for product and order data
description: This project involved the development of a sophisticated web application for Boomf, built in close collaboration with another developer and fully integrated with the Shopify platform.
The core feature of the application is an interactive postcard customizer that allows users to design personalized cards with unique mechanical elements directly within the purchasing flow.
Advanced frontend logic was implemented using React, Redux, and Redux-Saga to manage asynchronous operations, complex state transitions, and data synchronization.
Styled Components were used to create modular and scalable styles, ensuring a consistent visual identity and high-quality user experience.
The application integrates with the Shopify API to handle product data, pricing, and order-related interactions in a reliable and performant manner.
